column6: Doc Samson: both ally and enemy of the Hulk, and now...deadly instrument of an unseen agenda, with unknowable consequences. What has happened to Doc Samson and whose side is he on?
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | inker:Dario Brizuela | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Jeph Loeb | penciller:Whilce Portacio | colorist:Peter Steigerweld | colorist:Dean White
